docked.resolution_notes:
1080p for synthesis and full screen menus
900p for gameplay
810p for certain cutscenes
docked.fps_notes: 60 FPS for fullscreen menus and synthesis

handheld.resolution_notes:
720p for gameplay, synthesis and full screen menus
576p for certain cutscenes
handheld.fps_notes: 60 FPS for fullscreen menus and synthesis
